We went over the house together in order to choose a room in which he might work, but none pleased him save the State–room itself, and he informed me that he likes to smoke as he worked!! What will Ella say to that? He is a tee–totaller, & breakfasts off coffee & fruit. He talks incessantly, and perhaps the personal pronoun is over–worked but he is always interesting & suggestive! His opinions are expressed with a freedom, which suggests some lack of good breeding, & he volunteered the information that he 'had no education'. So there we are.
